title: Simulation Training for Developing and Applying Explicit Instruction Observation Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional theory and practical teaching experience
context.additional_context: A process for science professionals to experience the development of explicit teaching observation tools through VR simulations.

learning_goals: Explain at least three core components of COSTI-based observation tools
Measure the frequency of explicit instructional interactions in VR simulation environments with 80% accuracy
Write teacher feedback reports using developed observation tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
